Star Wars Wikipedia Star Wars From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Redirected from Starwars Jump navigation Jump search This article about media franchise as whole original film see Star Wars film other uses see Star Wars disambiguation Epic science fantasy space opera franchise Star Wars Created by George Lucas Original work Star Wars Owned by Lucasfilm Walt Disney Company Print publications Book s List reference books Novel s List novels Short stories See list novels Comics List comics Comic strip s Various Magazine s Star Wars Insider Films television Film s Skywalker saga films Clone Wars theatrical pilot Anthology films Full list Short film s Reflections Television series Mandalorian Untitled Cassian Andor series TBA Untitled Obi Wan Kenobi series TBA Animated series List animated series Television special s Holiday Special Television film s List TV films Games Traditional Various Role playing List RPGs Video game s List video games Audio Radio program s List radio dramas Original music Music Miscellaneous Toy s Merchandise Theme park attraction s List attractions Star Wars an American epic space opera media franchise created by George Lucas franchise began with eponymous film quickly became worldwide pop culture phenomenon original film later subtitled Episode IV New Hope was followed by sequels Episode V Empire Strikes Back Episode VI Return Jedi forming collectively referred as original trilogy prequel trilogy was later released consisting Episode Phantom Menace Episode II Attack Clones Episode III Revenge Sith Ten years later sequel trilogy began with Episode VII Force Awakens continued with Episode VIII Last Jedi will conclude with Episode IX Rise Skywalker first eight films were nominated Academy Awards with wins going first two released were commercially successful Together with theatrical anthology films Rogue One Solo Star Wars Story combined box office revenue films equates over US billion currently second highest grossing film franchise film series was expanded into other media including television series video games novels comic books theme park attractions themed areas resulting in an all encompassing fictional universe In Lucas sold his company Disney in most existing spin off media was made non canon rebranded as Star Wars Legends episodic Skywalker saga TV series Clone Wars define canon along with most other works released after April though few Legends universe media are still released some Legends characters are sometimes re introduced into canon example titular character from Timothy Zahn s Thrawn trilogy novels franchise holds Guinness World Records title Most successful film merchandising franchise In total value Star Wars franchise was estimated at US billion it currently fifth highest grossing media franchise all time Contents Premise Fictional timeline Film Skywalker saga Original trilogy Prequel trilogy Sequel trilogy Anthology films Television In other media Print media Novels Comics Audio Soundtracks singles Audio novels Radio Video games Early licensed games LucasArts modern self published games EA Star Wars present Theme park attractions Multimedia projects Merchandising Themes Historical influences Cultural impact Industry Fan works Academia See also References Sources Further reading External links Premise lightsaber blaster are an iconic part franchise Star Wars franchise depicts adventures characters long time ago in galaxy far far away in which humans many species aliens often humanoid co exist with robots droids may assist them in daily routines space travel between planets common due hyperspace technology mystical power known as Force described in original film as an energy field created by all living things that binds galaxy together Through training meditation those whom Force strong with are able perform various superpowers such as telekinesis precognition telepathy manipulation physical energy Force wielded by two major knighthood orders at conflict with each other Jedi peacekeepers Old Republic ruthlessly hunted by Imperial authorities act on light side Force through non attachment arbitration Sith ancient enemies galactic democracy use dark side by manipulating fear aggression While Jedi Knights can be numerous Dark Lords Sith Darths are intended be limited two master apprentice Force wielders are very limited in numbers in comparison rest average population Jedi Sith prefer use weapon called lightsaber which cylinder like hilt sword turned off but turned on ignites laser blade that can cut through virtually any surface Fights between two factions result in duels which are mix between sword skills use Force rest average population as well as renegades soldiers use laser powered blaster firearms which Force users can deflect using lightsabers Fictional timeline rises falls different regimes are chronicled throughout saga which split into three fictional eras Age Republic era prequel trilogy in which democratic Galactic Republic corrupted by its Supreme Chancellor Palpatine secretly dark lord Darth Sidious After orchestrating Clone Wars between government Separatist confederation Palpatine overthrows Republic establishes Galactic Empire declaring himself Emperor prequels feature relatively sleek new design aesthetic in comparison original trilogy Age Rebellion era original trilogy in which Empire fought by Rebel Alliance in Galactic Civil War that spans several years climaxing with apparent death Emperor surviving Rebellion gives rise New Republic original trilogy depicts galaxy as dirty grimy in George Lucas s depiction used universe Age Resistance era sequel trilogy in which remnants Empire reform as First Order Heroes former rebellion lead Resistance against oppressive dictatorship Rather than depend on an overabundant use computer generated imagery Force Awakens director J J Abrams determined not lose wonderful preposterousness puppetry practical effects that were used create classic trilogy Film Main article List Star Wars films Film U S release date Director s Screenwriter s Story by Producer s Original trilogy Episode IV New Hope May George Lucas Gary Kurtz Episode V Empire Strikes Back May Irvin Kershner Leigh Brackett Lawrence Kasdan George Lucas Episode VI Return Jedi May Richard Marquand Lawrence Kasdan George Lucas Howard Kazanjian Prequel trilogy Episode Phantom Menace May George Lucas Rick McCallum Episode II Attack Clones May George Lucas George Lucas Jonathan Hales George Lucas Episode III Revenge Sith May George Lucas Sequel trilogy Episode VII Force Awakens December J J Abrams Lawrence Kasdan J J Abrams Michael Arndt Kathleen Kennedy J J Abrams Bryan Burk Episode VIII Last Jedi December Rian Johnson Kathleen Kennedy Ram Bergman Episode IX Rise Skywalker December J J Abrams J J Abrams Chris Terrio Derek Connolly Colin Trevorrow Chris Terrio J J Abrams Kathleen Kennedy J J Abrams Michelle Rejwan Anthology films Rogue One Star Wars Story December Gareth Edwards Chris Weitz Tony Gilroy John Knoll Gary Whitta Kathleen Kennedy Allison Shearmur Simon Emanuel Solo Star Wars Story May Ron Howard Jonathan Kasdan Lawrence Kasdan Star Wars film series centers around three sets trilogies which collectively referred as Skywalker saga They were produced non chronologically with Episodes IV VI original trilogy being released between Episodes III prequel trilogy being released between Episodes VII IX sequel trilogy being released between Each trilogy focuses on generation Force sensitive Skywalker family original trilogy depict heroic development Luke Skywalker prequels tell downfall his father Anakin while sequels feature Luke s nephew Kylo Ren An anthology series set between main episodes entered development in parallel production sequel trilogy described by Disney CFO Jay Rasulo as origin stories first entry Rogue One tells story rebels steal Death Star plans directly before Episode IV Solo Star Wars Story focuses on Han Solo s backstory also featuring Chewbacca Lando Calrissian Lucasfilm has number Star Wars movies in development including trilogy films produced written by Game Thrones creators showrunners David Benioff D B Weiss installments were scheduled be released in December This changed in October it was announced that duo stepped away from Star Wars films stating that contract with Netflix making it so that they could not effectively work on films Kathleen Kennedy acknowledged that studio would be open pair returning work on trilogy schedule allows Another trilogy will be written by Last Jedi writer director Rian Johnson It will be independent from Skywalker saga In September it was announced that Kennedy Kevin Feige will collaborate develop an additional Star Wars film Skywalker saga Original trilogy Main article Star Wars Trilogy main cast trilogy includes Mark Hamill Luke Skywalker Harrison Ford Han Solo Carrie Fisher Princess Leia respectively In George Lucas wanted film an adaptation Flash Gordon serial but could not obtain rights so he began developing his own space opera b After directing American Graffiti he wrote two page synopsis which th Century Fox decided invest in By he had expanded story into first draft screenplay subsequent movie s success led Lucas make it basis an elaborate film serial With backstory he created sequel Lucas decided that series would be trilogy trilogies Most main cast would return two additional installments original trilogy which were self financed by Lucasfilm Star Wars was released on May first subtitled Episode IV New Hope in book Art Star Wars Episode V Empire Strikes Back was released on May also achieving wide financial critical success final film in trilogy Episode VI Return Jedi was released on May story original trilogy focuses on Luke Skywalker s quest become Jedi his struggle with evil Imperial agent Darth Vader struggle Rebel Alliance free galaxy from clutches Empire Prequel trilogy Main article Star Wars prequel trilogy main cast trilogy includes Ewan McGregor Obi Wan Kenobi Natalie Portman Padm Amidala Hayden Christensen Anakin Skywalker c respectively According producer Gary Kurtz loose plans prequel trilogy were developed during outlining original two films In Lucas confirmed that he had nine film series plotted but due stress producing original trilogy he had decided cancel further sequels by In Lucas explained that was never script completed that had entire story as it exists now As stories unfolded would take certain ideas save them kept taking out all good parts just kept telling myself would make other movies someday Technical advances in late s early s including ability create computer generated imagery CGI inspired Lucas consider that it might be possible revisit his saga In Lucas stated that prequels would be unbelievably expensive In he acknowledged that he had plans create prequel trilogy theatrical rerelease original trilogy in updated year old films with style CGI envisioned new trilogy Episode Phantom Menace was released on May Episode II Attack Clones on May Episode III Revenge Sith first PG film in franchise was released on May first two movies were met with mixed reviews with third being received somewhat more positively trilogy begins years before Episode IV follows Jedi training Anakin Skywalker Luke s father creation Sith lord Darth Vader as well as corruption Galactic Republic rise Empire Darth Sidious Together with original trilogy Lucas has collectively referred first six episodic films franchise as tragedy Darth Vader In DVD release original trilogy films were furtherly altered in order bring continuity with prequels example replacing Palpatine s depiction in Empire Strikes Back Anakin s in Return Jedi match prequel selves using prequel portrayers Sequel trilogy Main article Star Wars sequel trilogy main cast trilogy includes Adam Driver Kylo Ren Daisy Ridley Rey John Boyega Finn Oscar Isaac Poe Dameron respectively Prior releasing original film made possible by its success Lucas planned three trilogies nine films He announced this Time in confirmed that he had outlined them in At various stages development sequel trilogy was focus on rebuilding Republic return Luke in role similar that Obi Wan in original trilogy Luke s sister not yet determined be Leia Han Leia R D C PO However after beginning work on prequel trilogy Lucas insisted that Star Wars was meant be six part series that would be no sequel trilogy Lucas decided leave franchise in hands other filmmakers announcing in January that he would make no more Star Wars films In October that year Walt Disney Company agreed buy Lucasfilm announced that Episode VII would be released in co chairman Lucasfilm Kathleen Kennedy became president company served as executive producer new Star Wars feature films Lucas provided Kennedy his story treatments sequels during sale but in it was revealed Lucas s sequel outline had been discarded sequel trilogy also meant end existing Star Wars expanded universe which was discarded give maximum creative freedom filmmakers also preserve an element surprise discovery audience Episode VII Force Awakens was released on December Episode VIII Last Jedi on December Episode IX Rise Skywalker due be released on December Episode VII was met with both critical box office success Episode VIII while also meeting critical financial success had mixed reception from audiences sequel trilogy starts years after Episode VI focuses on journey Force sensitive orphan Rey guided by Luke Skywalker Along with ex stormtrooper Finn ace X Wing pilot Poe Dameron Rey helps Resistance led by Leia fight First Order commanded by Han Leia s son Luke s nephew Kylo Ren Anthology films Further information List Star Wars films Anthology films Before selling Lucasfilm Disney in parallel his development sequel trilogy George Lucas original trilogy co screenwriter Lawrence Kasdan started development on standalone film about young Han Solo On February Disney CEO Bob Iger made public development Kasdan film Disney CFO Jay Rasulo has described standalone films as origin stories Lucasfilm Kennedy have stated that standalone films would be referred as Star Wars anthology series albeit word anthology has not been used in any titles instead carrying promotional Star Wars Story subtitle Focused on Rebels obtained Death Star plans introduced in film first anthology film Rogue One was released on December favorable reviews box office success second Solo Star Wars Story centered on young Han Solo with Chewbacca Lando as supporting characters was released on May mixed reviews underperformance at box office Despite this more anthology films are expected be released following hiatus after s Rise Skywalker Television Main article List Star Wars television series Star Wars franchise has been spun off various television productions including three TV movies released between two animated series released in mid s Further animated series began be released in s first two which focused on Clone Wars After Disney s acquisition Lucasfilm only later one remained canon Three live action Star Wars series will be released on Disney first Mandalorian premiered on November In other media Main article Star Wars expanded other media From term Expanded Universe EU was an umbrella term all officially licensed Star Wars storytelling material set outside events depicted within theatrical films including novels comics video games Lucasfilm maintained internal continuity between films television content EU material until April company announced all EU works would cease production Existing works would no longer be considered canon franchise subsequent reprints would be rebranded under Star Wars Legends label with downloadable content massively multiplayer online game Old Republic only Legends material still be produced Star Wars canon was subsequently restructured only include existing six feature films animated film Clone Wars its companion animated series All future projects creative developments across all types media would be overseen coordinated by story group announced as division Lucasfilm created maintain continuity cohesive vision on storytelling franchise Multiple comics series from Marvel novels published by Del Rey were produced after announcement Print media Star Wars in print predates release first film with December novelization Star Wars initially subtitled From Adventures Luke Skywalker Credited Lucas it was ghostwritten by Alan Dean Foster first Expanded Universe story appeared in Marvel Comics Star Wars in January first six issues being an adaptation film followed by Foster s sequel novel Splinter Mind s Eye following month Novels Further information List Star Wars books Timothy Zahn authored Thrawn trilogy which was widely credited with revitalizing dormant Star Wars franchise After penning novelization original film Foster followed it with sequel Splinter Mind s Eye novelizations Empire Strikes Back by Donald F Glut Return Jedi by James Kahn followed as well as Han Solo Adventures trilogy by Brian Daley Adventures Lando Calrissian trilogy by L Neil Smith Timothy Zahn s bestselling Thrawn trilogy reignited interest in franchise introduced popular characters Grand Admiral Thrawn Mara Jade Talon Karrde Gilad Pellaeon first novel Heir Empire reached on New York Times Best Seller list series finds Luke Leia Han facing off against tactical genius Thrawn plotting retake galaxy Empire In Courtship Princess Leia by Dave Wolverton set immediately before Thrawn trilogy Leia considers an advantageous political marriage Prince Isolder planet Hapes but she Han ultimately marry Steve Perry s Shadows Empire set between Empire Strikes Back Return Jedi was part multimedia campaign that included comic book series video game novel introduced crime lord Prince Xizor another popular character would appear in multiple other works Other notable series from Bantam include Jedi Academy trilogy by Kevin J Anderson book Young Jedi Knights series by Anderson Rebecca Moesta X wing series by Michael Stackpole Aaron Allston Del Rey took over Star Wars book publishing in releasing would become installment novel series called New Jedi Order Written by multiple authors series was set years after original films introduced Yuuzhan Vong powerful alien race attempting invade conquer entire galaxy bestselling multi author series Legacy Force chronicles crossover Han Leia s son Jacen Solo dark side Force among his evil deeds he kills Luke s wife Mara Jade as sacrifice join Sith Although no longer canon story paralleled in Force Awakens with Han Leia s son Ben Solo has become dark Kylo Ren Three series set in prequel era were introduced younger audiences book Jedi Apprentice chronicles adventures Obi Wan Kenobi his master Qui Gon Jinn in years before Phantom Menace book Jedi Quest follows Obi Wan his own apprentice Anakin Skywalker in between Phantom Menace Attack Clones book Last Jedi set almost immediately after Revenge Sith features Obi Wan last few surviving Jedi Although Thrawn had been designated Legends character in he was reintroduced into canon in third season Rebels with Zahn returning write more novels based in character set in new canon Comics Main articles Star Wars comics List Star Wars comic books Marvel Comics published Star Wars comic book series from Original Star Wars comics were serialized in Marvel magazine Pizzazz between installments were first original Star Wars stories not directly adapted from films appear in print form as they preceded those Star Wars comic series From animated children s series Ewoks Droids inspired comic series from Marvel s Star Comics line In late s Marvel dropped new Star Wars comic it had in development which was picked up by Dark Horse Comics published as popular Dark Empire series Dark Horse subsequently launched dozens series set after original film trilogy including Tales Jedi X wing Rogue Squadron Star Wars Republic Star Wars Tales Star Wars Empire Knights Old Republic After Disney s acquisition Lucasfilm it was announced in January that in Star Wars comics license would return Marvel Comics whose parent company Marvel Entertainment Disney had purchased in Launched in first three publications were titled Star Wars Darth Vader limited series Princess Leia Audio Soundtracks singles Further information Music Star Wars John Williams composed soundtracks nine episodic films he has stated that he will retire from franchise following Rise Skywalker He also composed theme Adventures Han Solo Star Wars Story which John Powell composed rest score Michael Giacchino composed score Rogue One Audio novels Further information List Star Wars books Radio Further information Star Wars radio Radio adaptations films were also produced Lucas fan NPR affiliated campus radio station his alma mater University Southern California licensed Star Wars radio rights KUSC FM US production used John Williams original film score along with Ben Burtt s sound effects first was written by science fiction author Brian Daley directed by John Madden It was broadcast on National Public Radio in adapting original film into episodes Mark Hamill Anthony Daniels reprised film roles overwhelming success led episode adaptation Empire Strikes Back debuted in Billy Dee Williams joined other two stars reprising his role as Lando Calrissian In Buena Vista Records released an original minute Star Wars audio drama titled Rebel Mission Ord Mantell written by Daley In s Time Warner Audio Publishing adapted several Star Wars series from Dark Horse Comics into audio dramas three part Dark Empire saga Tales Jedi Dark Lords Sith Dark Forces trilogy Crimson Empire Return Jedi was adapted into episodes in featuring Daniels Video games Further information Star Wars video games List Star Wars video games Star Wars franchise has spawned over one hundred computer video board games dating back some earliest home consoles Some are based directly on movie material while others rely heavily on non canonical Expanded Universe rebranded as Star Wars Legends removed from canon in Star Wars games have gone through three significant development eras marked by change in leadership among developers early licensed games those developed after creation LucasArts those created after closure Lucasfilm division by Disney transfer license Electronic Arts Early licensed games first era began with first officially licensed electronic Star Wars game Kenner s table top Star Wars Electronic Battle Command In Parker Brothers published first Star Wars video game Atari Star Wars Empire Strikes Back It was followed in by Atari s rail shooter arcade game Star Wars which used vector graphics replicate Death Star trench run scene from film next game Star Wars Return Jedi used more traditional raster graphics while following Star Wars Empire Strikes Back returned vector graphics Star Wars was released Nintendo Entertainment System in followed by sequel following year Super Star Wars was also released in followed by two sequels over next two years LucasArts modern self published games Main article LucasArts beginning second era marked by prominence LucasArts modern self published games LucasArts was founded after Star Wars creator George Lucas took interest in increasing success video game market Wanting have more creative control over games narratives Lucas founded his own video game development company LucasArts During this era improved video game graphics allowed games tell complex narratives which allowed retelling films eventually original narratives set in same continuity as films with voice overs CGI cutscenes Lucasfilm had founded its own video game company in becoming best known adventure games World War II flight combat games In LucasArts released Star Wars X Wing first self published Star Wars video game first space flight simulator based on franchise It was one best selling video games established its own series games Rogue Squadron series was released between also focusing on space battles set during films Dark Forces hybrid adventure game incorporating puzzles strategy was first Star Wars first person shooter It featured gameplay graphical features not then common in other games made possible by LucasArts custom designed game engine Jedi game was well received it was followed by four sequels series introduced Kyle Katarn would appear in multiple games novels comics Katarn former stormtrooper joins rebellion becomes Jedi plot arc similar that Finn in Force Awakens massively multiplayer online role playing game Star Wars Galaxies was in operation from until After Disney bought Lucasfilm in games developed during first two eras were discarded from canon in reassigned non canonical Star Wars Legends label LucasArts ceased its role as developer in although it still operates as licensor EA Star Wars present After its acquisition by Disney LucasArts ceased being developer video game rights were reassigned Electronic Arts marking start third era Games made during this era are considered canonical feature more influence from Star Wars filmmakers Disney partnered with Lenovo create augmented reality video game Jedi Challenges released in November In August it was announced that Zynga would publish free play Star Wars mobile games Battlefront games received canonical reboot in Jedi Fallen Order will be release in late Theme park attractions Main article List Star Wars theme parks attractions In addition Disneyland ride Star Tours its renovation as Star Tours Adventures Continue many live attractions have been held at Disney parks including travelling exhibition Science Meets Imagination Space Mountain spin off Hyperspace Mountain walkthrough Launch Bay night time Galactic Spectacular An immersive themed area called Galaxy s Edge opened at Disneyland due open at Walt Disney World in mid themed hotel Star Wars Galactic Starcruiser currently under construction at Walt Disney World Title Park s Opening date Closing date Status Star Tours Disneyland January July Closed Tokyo Disneyland July April Disney s Hollywood Studios December September Disneyland Paris April March Star Wars Weekends Disney s Hollywood Studios Star Wars Science Meets Imagination Multiple locations October March Jedi Training Academy Disneyland July November Disney s Hollywood Studios October October Star Tours Adventures Continue Disney s Hollywood Studios May N Operating Disneyland June Tokyo Disneyland May Disneyland Paris March Star Wars Hyperspace Mountain Disneyland November May Closed Hong Kong Disneyland June N Operating Disneyland Paris May Star Wars Launch Bay Disneyland November Disney s Hollywood Studios December Shanghai Disneyland Park June Jedi Training Trials Temple Disney s Hollywood Studios December Disneyland December Disneyland Paris July Hong Kong Disneyland June Star Wars Galactic Spectacular Disney s Hollywood Studios June Star Wars Millennium Falcon Smugglers Run Disneyland May Multimedia projects multimedia project involves works released across multiple types media Shadows Empire was multimedia project set between Empire Strikes Back Return Jedi that included novel by Steve Perry comic book series video game action figures Force Unleashed was similar project set between Revenge Sith New Hope that included novel video game its sequel graphic novel role playing game supplement toys George Lucas made much his fortune by retaining his rights franchise s merchandising Merchandising Main articles Kenner Star Wars action figures List Kenner Star Wars action figures Star Wars Vintage Collection Lego Star Wars List Lego Star Wars sets Star Wars trading card Star Wars role playing games success Star Wars films led franchise become one most merchandised franchises in world While filming original film George Lucas decided take pay cut his salary as director in exchange full ownership franchise s merchandising rights first six films produced approximately US billion in merchandising revenue Kenner made first Star Wars action figures coincide with release film today original figures are highly valuable Since s Hasbro holds rights create action figures based on saga Pez dispensers began be produced in Star Wars was first intellectual property be licensed in Lego history Lego has produced animated parody short films mini series promote Star Wars sets Lego Star Wars video games are critically acclaimed bestsellers In board game Star Wars Escape from Death Star was released not be confused with board game with same name published in Star Wars Monopoly themed versions Trivial Pursuit Battleship were released in with updated versions released in subsequent years board game Risk has been adapted in two editions by Hasbro Clone Wars Edition Original Trilogy Edition Three Star Wars tabletop role playing games have been developed version by West End Games in s s one by Wizards Coast in s one by Fantasy Flight Games in s Star Wars trading cards have been published since first blue series by Topps in Dozens series have been produced with Topps being licensed creator in United States Some card series are film stills while others are original art Many cards have become highly collectible with some very rare promos such as Galaxy Series II floating Yoda P card often commanding US more While most base common card sets are plentiful many insert chase cards are very rare From until Decipher Inc had license created produced collectible card game based on franchise Themes See also Star Wars sources analogues Star Wars features elements such as knighthood chivalry Jungian archetypes such as shadow are also many references Christianity such as in appearance Darth Maul whose design draws heavily from traditional depictions devil Anakin was conceived virgin birth assumed be Chosen One messianic individual However unlike Jesus Anakin falls from grace remaining evil as Darth Vader until Return Jedi According Adam Driver sequel trilogy villain Kylo Ren idolizes Vader believes he doing he thinks right George Lucas has said that theme saga redemption saga draws heavily from hero s journey an archetypical template developed by comparative mythologist Joseph Campbell Each character primarily Anakin Luke Rey follows steps cycle undergoes its reversal becoming villain defining step journey Atonement with Father Obi Wan s loss father figure could have impacted his relationship with Anakin whom both Obi Wan Palpatine are fatherlike mentors Luke s discovery that Vader his father has strong repurcussions on saga regarded as one most influential plot twists in cinema Supreme Leader Snoke encourages Kylo Ren kill his father Han Solo Kylo uses fact that Rey an orphan tempt her into joining dark side According Inverse final scene in Last Jedi which depicts servant children playing with toy Luke one boy using Force symbolizes that Force can be found in people with humble beginnings Historical influences Political science has been an important element Star Wars since franchise launched in focusing on struggle between democracy dictatorship Darth Vader s design initially inspired by Samurai armor also incorporated German military helmet Originally Lucas conceived Sith as group that served Emperor in same way that Schutzstaffel served Adolf Hitler this was condensed into one character in form Darth Vader Stormtroopers borrow name Nazi shock troopers Imperial officers wear uniforms resembling those German forces during World War II political security officers resemble black clad SS down stylized silver death s head on caps World War II terms were used names in films e g planets Kessel term that refers group encircled forces Hoth after German general served on snow laden Eastern Front Shots commanders looking through AT AT walker viewscreens in Empire Strikes Back resemble tank interiors space battles in original film were based on World War World War II dogfights Palpatine being chancellor before becoming Emperor in prequel trilogy alludes Hitler s role before appointing himself F hrer Lucas has also drawn parallels historical dictators such as Julius Caesar Napoleon Bonaparte politicians like Richard Nixon d Great Jedi Purge mirrors events Night Long Knives corruption Galactic Republic modeled after fall democratic Roman Republic formation an empire On inspiration First Order formed from ashes Empire Force Awakens director J J Abrams spoke conversations writers had about Nazis could have escaped Argentina after WWII started working together again Cultural impact Main articles Cultural impact Star Wars Star Wars fandom It has been suggested that Star Wars fandom be merged into this article Discuss Proposed since September Star Wars saga has had significant impact on popular culture with references its fictional universe deeply embedded in everyday life Phrases like evil empire May Force be with have become part popular lexicon first Star Wars film in was cultural unifier enjoyed by wide spectrum people film can be said have helped launch science fiction boom late s early s making science fiction films mainstream genre widespread impact made it prime target parody works homages with popular examples including Hardware Wars Spaceballs Family Guy Trilogy Robot Chicken Star Wars In Library Congress selected original Star Wars film preservation in U S National Film Registry as being culturally historically aesthetically significant Empire Strikes Back was selected in mm reels Special Editions were versions initially presented preservation difficulty transferring from original prints but it was later revealed that Library possesses copyright deposit print original theatrical releases Industry original Star Wars film was huge success th Century Fox was credited reinvigorating company Within three weeks film s release studio s stock price doubled record high Prior th Century Fox s greatest annual profits were million while in company broke that record by posting profit million franchise helped Fox change from an almost bankrupt production company thriving media conglomerate Star Wars fundamentally changed aesthetics narratives Hollywood films switching focus Hollywood made films from deep meaningful stories based on dramatic conflict themes irony sprawling special effects laden blockbusters as well as changing Hollywood film industry in fundamental ways Before Star Wars special effects in films had not appreciably advanced since s commercial success Star Wars created boom in state art special effects in late s Along with Jaws Star Wars started tradition summer blockbuster film in entertainment industry films open on many screens at same time profitable franchises are important It created model major film trilogy showed that merchandising rights on film could generate more money than film itself did original Star Wars trilogy widely considered one best film trilogies in history Numerous filmmakers have been influenced by Star Wars including Damon Lindelof Dean Devlin Roland Emmerich John Lasseter David Fincher Joss Whedon John Singleton Kevin Smith later Star Wars directors J J Abrams Gareth Edwards Christopher Nolan cited Star Wars as an influence making blockbuster film Inception Lucas s concept used universe particularly influenced Ridley Scott s Blade Runner Alien James Cameron s Aliens as well as Terminator George Miller s Mad Max Peter Jackson s Lord Rings trilogy Regarding return expansion franchise Lawrence Kasdan noted that spin offs were expanding franchise into more shared universe beyond previously linear saga adding that one strengths franchise was it all fell under same continuity in comparison other franchises Kasdan also contrasted Star Wars Marvel Cinematic Universe noting that Star Wars features less comedy than latter adding that he felt more comedic approach would not be Star Wars him Film critic Roger Ebert wrote in his book Great Movies Like Birth Nation Citizen Kane Star Wars was technical watershed that influenced many movies that came after It began new generation special effects high energy motion pictures film was one first films link genres together invent new high concept genre filmmakers build upon Finally along with Steven Spielberg s Jaws it shifted film industry s focus away from personal filmmaking s towards fast paced big budget blockbusters younger audiences Some critics have blamed Star Wars Jaws ruining Hollywood by shifting its focus from sophisticated films such as Godfather Taxi Driver Annie Hall films about spectacle juvenile fantasy industry shift from stand alone one done films towards blockbuster franchises with multiple sequels prequels One such critic Peter Biskind complained all was said done Lucas Spielberg returned s audience grown sophisticated on diet European New Hollywood films simplicities pre s Golden Age movies They marched backward through looking glass In an opposing view Tom Shone wrote that through Star Wars Jaws Lucas Spielberg didn t betray cinema at all they plugged it back into grid returning medium its roots as carnival sideshow magic act one big special effect which was kind rebirth Fan works Main article Star Wars fan films Star Wars saga has inspired many fans create own non canon material set in Star Wars galaxy In recent years this has ranged from writing fan fiction creating fan films In Lucasfilm sponsored first annual Official Star Wars Fan Film Awards officially recognizing filmmakers genre concerns over potential copyright trademark issues however contest was initially open only parodies mockumentaries documentaries Fan fiction films set in Star Wars universe were originally ineligible but in Lucasfilm changed submission standards allow in universe fiction entries Lucasfilm has allowed but not endorsed creation fan fiction as long as it does not attempt make profit Academia As characters storyline original trilogy are so well known educators have used films in classroom as learning resource example project in Western Australia honed elementary school students storytelling skills by role playing action scenes from movies later creating props audio visual scenery enhance performance Others have used films encourage second level students integrate technology in science classroom by making prototype lightsabers Similarly psychiatrists in New Zealand US have advocated use in university classroom explain different types psychopathology See also Speculative fiction portal Film portal Science fiction portal Architecture Star Wars Jedi census phenomenon Jediism List Star Wars creatures Physics Star Wars Wookieepedia Star Wars Wiki st Legion Star Wars Celebration Star Wars Day Music Star Wars Star Wars documentaries Story Star Wars Technology in Star Wars List space science fiction franchises References Informational notes film s release was preceded by its novelization in November Lucas started by researching inspiration behind Alex Raymond s Flash Gordon comic leading him works author Edgar Rice Burroughs John Carter Mars series in particular Played by Jake Lloyd as kid in Episode In his early drafts Lucas used plot point dictator staying in power with support military In his comment made in prequel trilogy era Lucas attributed this Nixon s supposed intention defy nd Amendment but president was actually impeached never ran third term
